analysis.key_quote: Don't be short-sighted. Today one Party may control the Presidency, the Senate, the House, and the Supreme Court. And it will change. And today's 'victories' will be overturned and made even more extreme, in the other direction, in the future.
analysis.rationale: The comment emphasizes the importance of a merit-based system and warns against the dangers of politicization in federal employment, aligning with concerns about the potential negative impacts of the proposed rule.
